description: Beat The Salesman, is a video lecture course designed to take you through the 6 steps that you can learn easily and is broken down with each one having its own video lecture. These steps that will keep you in control of the decision making from the beginning to the end of your next automobile purchase. You will learn negotiating skills that veteran sales professionals use. Six easy steps that you follow to be prepared to buy a vehicle and save your money.
title: Beat The Salesman
